Text:
Hi. Thanks for your efforts.
There's however a sound issue (no sound) in several parts of the video : at 1min 28sec, 2min 37sec, etc..
Could a Proper or Repack could then be released please?!..
@Joss70: If one is released I will be sure to upload it asap.
@Joss70: Just checked four sites and no repack has been released as of yet. Try here for the xvid release(http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6472995/XIII_The_Series_2011_S01E09_WS.XviD-err0001)

Thanks for your concern.

Yes, I knew the "err0001" XviD release. But as always with these ones, it's full of trailers or commercials (sometimes almost 1/4 of the video screen!) , channel logo..
That's why these Web-dl are so neat!  :)

(Plus I work on high-quality French subtitles for this whole XIII series, so you can imagine how Web-dl are so much better then... ^_^ )

Well, hopefully people who originally made this version will realize this sound issue I pointed and will have others feedbacks than mine too..
For a repack to be post.

Thanks for : "If one is released I will be sure to upload it asap. " !
:)

Answer from ION: 

"In the first four minutes, there were 3 audio and video glitches.
i will report to Apple. Let's hope they will fix that."

So let's hope Apple will...
As of now, no repack has been posted at any of my direct download sites. I will keep checking and if one is reposted I will upload it here asap.
Still no repack to be found.

I know the Directdownload sites too, yes it seems no repack will be released or at least not for now..

Thanks a lot anyway for your presence Thetorrentlord, from this topic and from all your previous releases, it's another proof of how good and serious you are... A pleasure and really.
So nothing to do here with people who just post mediocre things then run.
Thanks for this and for your work.
Still no repack. Just watched this and there is missing audio in several places on my copy.
Same issue and again for the E10_720p from ION... Lol  ^_^
